title: The Lost and Found Journal of a Miner 49er: Vol. 1
description: Are you ready to embark on a thrilling journey through Christian-themed folklore?Take a step into the world of The Lost and Found Journal of a Miner 49er, Vol. 1, where Jack Dublin will charm you with outlandish tales from the Old West. But along the way you will encounter mythical creatures like wish-granting mermaids and talking coyotes, as well as infamous outlaws who will entangle themselves in your imagination. And just when you think you've heard it all, a dreadful Canyon Sphinx will leave you on the edge of your seat. Join the rush and discover the secrets waiting to be uncovered!If you enjoyed reading The Wingfeather Saga, you'll love this book! Immerse yourself in a world filled with wonder and adventure, and experience the thrill of a lifetime.**Bravery required
author: Jack Dublin
